item.title: LYON
item.description: Series: On-Going. Follow along through the trials and tribulations of Mr. O (Tanktop Owl) as he discovers what it means to be the best teacher ever, and uncovers the sinister secrets behind an organization to which he’s devoted his life.

item.title: Kitchen X Warz
item.description: Written in 2020. The Kitchenettes have had ENOUGH of the HUE-MANS! They have decided to pick their 5 strongest Kitchenees, and have them duke it out to see who will lead them in WAR.

item.title: Animl Farm: Epilogue
item.description: Written in 2018. Ever wondered what happened at the Animal Farm after the Pigs took control? Check out this epilogue!

item.title: The Navigators: Ignis Carcerem
item.description: Written in 2019. ÜberLife, The Conglomerate™ is at it again! Join Xandi and her Navigator, Torpe-Do, as they break Xandi’s father out of jail!

item.title: Tyotus Buckets: Aqua Bellum
item.description: Written in 2018. ÜberLife, The Conglomerate™ has determined it is time to start cleaning up the mess that is GNU City!
